definition: (bird species of China) tundra swan (Cygnus columbianus)

sentences.english: My dearest Miss Cygnet , I see I don't look good.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的小天鵝，我知道我外形不佳。

sentences.english: Little Swan and Jinsong are domestic.
sentences.chinese: 小天鵝和金松是國產的。

sentences.english: Tundra swan and Canada geese literally surrounded them.
sentences.chinese: 小天鵝和加拿大雁簡直是包圍了他們。

sentences.english: However, not just anyone will be able to buy a Cygnet .
sentences.chinese: 然而，不只是所有人都能夠購買小天鵝。

sentences.english: And based on that, he expects to sell 4000 copies of the Cygnet each year.
sentences.chinese: 並在此基礎上，他預計銷售4000份小天鵝每年。

sentences.english: Ugly is not ugly. He is a very beautiful swan.
sentences.chinese: 醜小鴨一點也不醜，它是一直非常漂亮的小天鵝。

definition: Yancheng district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
Hanyuan county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
Dexing county level city in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
to keep up with the latest fashion
full moon/first full moon after birth (i.e. entering the second month)
